long_description: Go fast and light! The Sparks R&D LT Pin System improves performance and durability when touring with your splitboard. This touring bracket is lighter, stiffer and more durable than the traditional touring bracket. 7075-aluminum pins feature self-lubricating bushings to reduce wear and tear. Aluminum pins are half the weight of standard Spark pins, shaving 3.5 oz. off the setup. Works with Blaze and Burner splitboard bindings, sold separately.
